feature.label: Library Folder ClasspathContainer
feature.description: Eclipse 3.x plugin of Library Folder ClasspathContainer (http://www.eclipse-plugins.info/eclipse/plugin_details.jsp?id=409). This plugin will add all .jar and .zip files of a folder to you classpath.
